ti.title: Computer Engineering
ti.description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering focusing on Cyber Security, Artificial Intelligence, Software Engineering, and Web Development
ti.overview_1: The Computer Engineering undergraduate program at STMIK Tazkia was officially established on June 25, 2024 through Decree Number 078/SK/LAM-INFOKOM/Ak.Min/S/VI/2024. This program is designed to produce competent leaders with noble character in the field of information technology.
ti.overview_2: The curriculum is structured based on the Outcome-Based Education (OBE) approach and refers to the National Higher Education Standards (SN-Dikti), with references from APTIKOM, ACM, and IEEE. The program supports Merdeka Belajar Kampus Merdeka (MBKM) with 12 credits of Industrial Internship.
ti.feature_obe_desc: Measurable learning outcomes following OBE principles and KKNI Level 6
ti.feature_mbkm_desc: 12 credits of industry internship for real work experience in semester 5
ti.feature_industry_desc: Curriculum references ACM and IEEE with professional certifications
ti.specializations_subtitle: Choose your focus area according to your interests and career goals

cyber_security.description: Protecting systems and networks from cyber security threats

si.title: Information Systems
si.description: Bachelor's degree in Information Systems with 2026 curriculum, specializing in Project Management, AI & Intelligent Systems, Data Analytics, and Business Information System. Based on IS2020 (ACM/AIS) and KKNI Level 6.
si.overview_1: The Information Systems undergraduate program at STMIK Tazkia uses the 2026 curriculum based on IS2020 (ACM/AIS) and KKNI Level 6. The curriculum is designed to produce graduates competent in designing, developing, and managing information systems that support organizational business processes.
si.overview_2: All courses integrate GenAI (Claude/ChatGPT) as a standard work tool and apply project-based learning with real UMKM projects, not simulations. The program supports MBKM with 12 credits of Internship/Practical Work.
si.feature_obe_desc: Real UMKM projects every semester, not simulations. Students work on projects directly for UMKM clients.
si.feature_mbkm_desc: Claude and ChatGPT are used as standard work tools across all courses.
si.feature_industry_desc: Curriculum based on international IS2020 (ACM/AIS) and national KKNI Level 6 standards.
si.specializations_subtitle: Choose your focus area according to your interests and career goals

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Shaping Indonesia's Excellent Future Generation
about.description: STMIK Tazkia is a higher education institution in Bogor under Yayasan Tazkia Cendikia
about.name_meaning: Tazkia derives from Arabic, signifying growth and development through purification. The institution commits to fostering student development.
about.founder: Established by Prof. Dr. Muhammad Syafi'i Antonio
about.vision: To Become an Outstanding Higher Education Institution in Information Technology That Produces Competent Graduates with Noble Character in Building the Halal Industry Ecosystem
about.mission_1: Deliver quality education according to standards to produce graduates with excellent quality, competence, and noble character in building the halal industry ecosystem.
about.mission_2: Conduct superior technology and information systems research with environmental awareness in the halal industry ecosystem, beneficial for scientific development and community welfare.
about.mission_3: Provide community service through the application of technology and information systems in the halal industry ecosystem to create an independent, productive, and prosperous society.
about.mission_4: Implement standardized higher education governance while teaching ethics and character values.
about.mission_5: Create learning processes and environments that empower students to develop communication intelligence, analysis, and creative and innovative decision-making, emphasizing mutual sharpening, compassion, and nurturing.
about.mission_6: Build and develop strategic partnerships with institutions both nationally and internationally.
about.unique_approach_intro: At STMIK Tazkia, we implement an innovative learning method that combines 4 courses in one industry project over 16 weeks. This approach ensures students not only learn theory, but immediately apply it in real projects.
about.unique_approach_integration_desc: Each semester, students work on one major project that integrates Project Management, Software Engineering, Prototyping, and Database. All courses run in parallel and support each other.
about.unique_approach_industry_desc: Projects are not simulations, but actual needs from industry partners. Students interact directly with stakeholders, receive professional feedback, and produce ready-to-use products.
about.unique_approach_quality_desc: All projects follow CMMI Maturity Level 2 standards and are tested using the System Usability Scale (SUS). Students learn methodologies and tools used in professional work environments.
about.unique_approach_outcomes_desc: Our graduates are prepared to have portfolios of real projects, industry connections, and professional skills (communication, teamwork, presentation) that are expected to make them job-ready from day one.

admissions.title: New Student Admissions
admissions.subtitle: Join STMIK Tazkia and start your career journey in information technology
admissions.description: New student admission information for STMIK Tazkia
admissions.intake_subtitle: Choose an admission period that fits your schedule
admissions.req_1: High school diploma or equivalent (certified copy)
admissions.process_subtitle: Easy steps to become a STMIK Tazkia student
admissions.step_1_desc: Complete the online registration form with your personal data
admissions.step_2_desc: Make payment for registration fee via bank transfer
admissions.step_3_desc: Upload report card or take Academic Potential Test (TPA)
admissions.step_4_desc: Check new student admission selection results
admissions.payment_note: Installment payment available up to 3 times per semester
admissions.scholarship_1_desc: Free registration and tuition fees plus monthly allowance
admissions.scholarship_3_desc: Partial scholarship up to 80% of tuition fees
admissions.faq_1_a: No written exam. Selection is based on document verification and a brief interview.
admissions.faq_2_q: How long is the study period?
admissions.faq_2_a: The bachelor's program can be completed in 3.5 - 4 years (7-8 semesters) with a total of 144 credits.
admissions.faq_3_a: Yes, we provide regular classes with flexible schedules to accommodate working students.
admissions.faq_4_a: Payment can be made per semester with installment options up to 3 payments.
admissions.faq_5_a: Yes, STMIK Tazkia is accredited and the degree is recognized by the Ministry of Education.
admissions.cta_subtitle: Register now and achieve a bright future with STMIK Tazkia
